tool_description:
This API takes URL and converts to QR image and returns back.
This API runs with Python Flask Server and it is super fast.
You have to just send URL and you will receive QR Code image in response with download.
title: QRCodeGenerator

api_list.name: QRCodeImage
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a 'GET' request with url/string as a parameter and returns qr code image
